channel.title: WordPress Multisite on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in WordPress Multisite on Damien Saunders

item.title: HOW TO Get Started with WordPress Multisite – build it in 5 minutes
item.description: WordPress Multisite or WordPress Network or WPMU – any of these refer to WordPress when it has been setup as a network of blogs or websites. I’ve been using WordPress Multisite for about 3 years now – many more famous WordPress people have written about setting up WordPress Multisite, but this is my take on it. I want to show you that it is easy to get started with WordPress Multisite in fact you can have your network of WordPress sites up in under 5 minutes (supposing you already have WordPress installed).
